metadata.title: CVE-2020-26560 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth Mesh Provisioning in the Bluetooth Mesh profile 1.0 and 1.0.1 maypermit a nearby device, reflecting the authentication evidence from aProvisioner, to complete authentication without possessing the AuthValue,and potentially acquire a NetKey and AppKey.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
